CHAT.comment: MORGAN STANLEY CAPITAL GROUP INC., Petitioner v. PUBLIC UTILITY DISTRICT NO. 1 OF SNOHOMISH COUNTY, WASHINGTON, ET AL.; and AMERICAN ELECTRIC POWER SERVICE CORPORATION, ET AL., Petitioners v. PUBLIC UTILITY DISTRICT NO. 1 OF SNOHOMISH COUNTY, WASHINGTON, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT FERC, IN SUPPORT OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF WALTER DELLINGER ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CHRISTOPHER J. WRIGHT ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER IN SUPPORT OF PETITIONERS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENT FERC, IN SUPPORT OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:05 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
